Author: Damaya_Syenite_Essun
Text: I drunkenly outed myself to my husband the other night. Good thing he was also drunk. He hasnâ€™t brought it up.

Author: DogTeeth_Val
Text: I think one of the most frustrating things about my ED is the inability to reach out to people about it. I also think, on some level, the massive urge to tell someone when I am drunk comes from this frustration. I've never spilled the beans because I'm a big coward but I wish I could
